title: Concrete Compressive Strength Prediction Simulation Using Ensemble Machine Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental statistical concepts, basic principles of machine learning, understanding of concrete material properties
context.additional_context: Provision of a simulation environment that allows workers to indirectly experience practical tasks in materials research/construction fields.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of ensemble learning models (RFR/ABR) and perform data preprocessing.
Learners can build a concrete compressive strength prediction model using a Jupyter Notebook-based simulation tool.
Based on prediction results, learners can propose optimal concrete mix designs and material ratios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
